phrases: I am going to run in the Hakone Ekiden.
Starting today, I am going to win over all the guys.
No one knows that for sure.
The top track and field teams train every day for years,
but only a handful of them even qualify.
That is the kind of race it is.
You know a lot about Hakone Ekiden?
Dreams do come true if you try.
Nico-chan Senpai has track and field experience.
Yuki made it to a prefectural kendo tournament with his team.
The twins and King played soccer for three years in high school.
Shindo used to walk ten kilometers through the mountains to get to school and back everyday.
And Musa has a hidden talent.
It is prejudiced to think black people are fast runners.
I confirmed in the bath that you have got good muscles.
That is why you are always staring at me?
I want you guys to see how he runs.
Excuse me, but I was not included just now.
In other words, I do not have to run
I am not going to run with you guys.
Kurahara, there is an open seat there.
Have as many helpings as you would like.
I am going to clean the toilets.
I am going to feed Nira.
No one's going along with Haiji's plan, right?
I was going to run away if you guys said you would do it.
Between school and work, he is too busy.
I doubt he would just back down.
These are the most luxurious dishes we have been served all month.
He is domesticated us, has not he?
We are going to school today.
We thought we would check things out before the entrance ceremony.
Joji, they have got a soccer club.
I do not know which to join.
You are going to keep playing soccer?
Well, you heard what Haiji said.
That makes it harder to play.
Who cares if you want to play soccer?
It is not that we want to play soccer.
Who does not love a cute manager?
Hey, the futsal team is co-ed!
We hope you will consider joining us.
In that case, write your name
It will not be easy for you to pack, so I thought I would tell you first.
Apparently, you cannot stay at Aotake if you are not on the track and field team.
In other words, if you refuse to be on the team, you have to move
I am just saying you cannot live there if you do not ru
I guess you could say that.
It will cost a fortune to move all that stuff.
But you do not have to leave if you join the team.
1) Receive an evaluation 3) Find the right job
2) Search for job information 4) Plan your career
You will get to experience all four steps in choosing a job.
What kind of a job do you want?
I bet you could talk about the Ekiden at interviews.
It is not something everyone gets to experience.
There was not a Mountain God this year.
Well, they cannot name one every year.
Shindo, how about where you are from?
You have not been home recently, right?
I am sure your family would be delighted if they saw
the son they rarely see energetically running on TV.
Oh, that is because I was out.
Lawyers sure have got it easy.
You should hurry up and graduate.
Think you will enjoy your student life?
If you are looking for a special-event club, I can introduce you to one.
It is an option if you are looking to experience college life.
If I want to run, I will run alone.
I went to work early after dropping in on the new student symposium...
No, thank you for accommodating me.
Anyway, I am glad I introduced him to you.
He is such a hard worker.
You have got a great friend.
You should be grateful you met him.
That is a friend for life.
He asked me what my plans were for tomorrow morning,
and I responded that I was not busy...
He knew you could not say no.
He is going after our weaknesses.
He said it would help me find a job...
It is good for my health... like weight loss?
What deals did you make with him?
I did not make a deal!
I really have been gaining weight lately.
I should not have let you go off on your own.
Well, at least you are better than these two.
We thought everyone had promised to run in the Ekiden.
Did you listen until Haiji was finished talking?
So we said we would, too.
But we thought we would give it a shot, right?
Girls love guys who run in the Ekiden!
That is only true of a handful of top finishers!
There is no way we will even qualify!
You mean we cannot just sign up for it?
I do not even feel like explaining it.
He said girls would love us!
Maybe he is not back yet.
I cannot believe it broke now.
It is a miracle... my heart... did not stop...
Sorry, but you cannot use our bathroom until it is fixed.
You will have to go there for a while.
It is just for a change of pace.
Do not tell the guys at Aotake.
Does not look like you are going back, though.
Do you actually want to run?
I said it is for a change of pace.
Besides, I am not cut out for it.
You know a lot about running, right?
You ever seen a runner as rough around the edges as me?
I will take you someplace fun before you leave.
That is what we call this place.
You do not often hang out with the newbie.
An ogre has arrived in hell!
I do not want to think about it.
Everyone else thinks it is too hot, though.
You are never in for more than a minute.
They are the residents of Aotake.
So you have finally got ten.
I met him after I left yesterday.
To see who can stay in the bath longer.
The loser does whatever the winner says.
You do not have to accept his challenge, Kurahara.
If you refuse, I will assume you are running away.
If you want to run, then run.
I will not keep chasing you.
Hey, do not push yourselves too hard.
Feel free to get out first.
Why are you getting so sentimental?
You are not going to run with him, are you?
Yuki, why do not we have our own contest?
We will bet on who wins.
If you win, I will do whatever you want.
Are you even trying to win?
Why did you have to be so stubborn?
He is been waiting a long time to get all ten guys.
I think he is reckless, but I have been watching him for four years.
He always follows through when he says he would do something.
In that case, can I make him give up?
Can I make him give up?
I do not know what happened, but go ahead.
It will make things easier for me.
I have still got time, right?
Sure, but it is better to start packing early.
